comments.text:
With a full exhaust will the slp kit hit the 600 mark? 575 is not enough. 
What are the limits for how much power that blower unit can handle 
reliably? I feel like a pro charger ds1c is a better choice for the money.﻿

comments.text:
with a AF gauge ,you can fine tune a carb .I use it to make carb air bleeds 
.I use small brass bolts with the correct thread ,and drill them out with 
very small drill bits.﻿

comments.author: Tamas Bodo

comments.text:
+Tamas Bodo It actually is aluminum here, it's spelled that way on 
scientific papers, everything. That arises from a dispute on how the man 
who discovered it named it, most of North America decided aluminum was 
good, and many other nations decided on aluminium. Not a big deal, just a 
difference in language at this point.

comments.author: David Barnes

comments.text:
People are stupid...
1: YES there are ads on this show...They DO need money to do all of the 
shows that they do so how do you expect that they can get that money? I'm 
sure if you would like to fork over enough money to pay for their time and 
tools and the parts that they will need then they will get rid of the ads. 
Until you decide to do that SHUT UP ABOUT THE ADS.
2: To all of the people complaining about the camaro only running 
12.6...OBVIOUSLY if you ACTUALLY watched the video then you would've heard 
Finnegan say that the clutch was toast and it spun a lot. SO I'm sure it 
would be about a 12 flat or so if it had a good clutch and a good launch as 
well.
3: This is a FREE video for to watch so why the hell are you complaining 
anyway?
Now to the crew of Roadkill...Y'all do an awesome job and I love watching 
all of the roadkill episodes. I've watched them all at least 2 times. Keep 
up the great work!﻿

comments.text:
I don't understand why some people are so butt hurt about this show. It's 
clearly stated as a different show. They use cool parts for their 
cars from sponsors that allow them to do road kill. It's not like they are 
promoting orange juice or toothpaste. Everything is relevant to what they 
are about. If you don't like it, then choose not to watch the next 
installment and  don't talk shit because clearly by the like bar, a lot of 
people enjoy it.﻿
